java/liquibase/dbdoc/TableWriter.java

00001 package liquibase.dbdoc;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.change.Change;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00007 
00008 import java.io.File;
00009 import java.io.FileWriter;
00010 import java.io.IOException;
00011 import java.util.ArrayList;
00012 import java.util.Arrays;
00013 import java.util.List;
00014 
00015 public class TableWriter extends HTMLWriter {
00016 
00017     public TableWriter(File rootOutputDir, Database database) {
00018         super(new File(rootOutputDir, "tables"), database);
00019     }
00020 
00021     protected String createTitle(Object object) {
00022         return "Changes affecting table \""+object.toString() + "\"";
00023     }
00024 
00025     protected void writeCustomHTML(FileWriter fileWriter, Object object, List<Change> changes, Database database) throws IOException {
00026         writeColumns(fileWriter, ((Table) object), database);
00027     }
00028 
00029     private void writeColumns(FileWriter fileWriter, Table table, Database database) throws IOException {
00030         List<List<String>> cells = new ArrayList<List<String>>();
00031 
00032         for (Column column : table.getColumns()) {
00033             cells.add(Arrays.asList(column.getDataTypeString(database),
00034                     "<A HREF=\"../columns/" + table.getName() + "." + column.getName() + ".html" + "\">" + column.getName() + "</A>"));
00035             //todo: add foreign key info to columns?
00036         }
00037 
00038 
00039         writeTable("Current Columns", cells, fileWriter);
00040 
00041     }
00042 }
